General.Name: Juic International
General.Description: Juic International Corporation provides electronic products processing related materials for computer and consumer electronics manufacturing industries in Taiwan. It provides composite materials used in the manufacturing process of various electronic products. The company was formerly known as H&T Electronics Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Juic International Corporation in June 2015. Juic International Corporation was founded in 1982 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.
